verses.verse: Then he cried <S%H7121><s%> in my ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cause those who are in charge <S%H6486><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> to draw near, <S%H7126><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> with his destroying <S%H4892><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Behold, <S%H8337><s%> six men <S%H582><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> of the upper <S%H5945><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> which lies <S%H6437><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> with his slaughter <S%H4660><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in their midst <S%H8432><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> with a writer <S%H5608><s%>'s inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side. <S%H4975><s%> They went in, <S%H935><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> altar. <S%H4196><s%>

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> from the cherub, <S%H3742><s%> whereupon it was, <S%H4670><s%> to the threshold of the house: <S%H1004><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who had the writer <S%H5608><s%>'s inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side. <S%H4975><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5674><s%> Go through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and set <S%H8427><s%> a mark <S%H8420><s%> on the foreheads <S%H4696><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that sigh <S%H584><s%> and that cry <S%H602><s%> over all the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that are done <S%H6213><s%> in its midst. <S%H8432><s%>

To the others <S%H428><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> in my hearing, <S%H241><s%> Go <S%H5674><s%> through the city <S%H5892><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H5221><s%> and strike: don't <S%H5869><s%> let your eye spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither have pity; <S%H2550><s%>

kill <S%H2026><s%> utterly <S%H4889><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> man, <S%H970><s%> the young man and the virgin, <S%H1330><s%> and little children <S%H2945><s%> and women; <S%H802><s%> but don't <S%H5066><s%> come near any man <S%H376><s%> on whom is the mark: <S%H8420><s%> and begin <S%H2490><s%> at my sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%> Then they began <S%H2490><s%> at the old <S%H2205><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2930><s%> Defile the house, <S%H1004><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the courts <S%H2691><s%> with the slain. <S%H2491><s%> Go forth! <S%H3318><s%> They went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

It happened, <S%H5221><s%> while they were smiting, and I was left, <S%H7604><s%> that I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face, <S%H6440><s%> and cried, <S%H2199><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh! <S%H136><s%> will you destroy <S%H7843><s%> all the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in your pouring out <S%H8210><s%> of your wrath <S%H2534><s%> on Jerusalem? <S%H3389><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5771><s%> The iniquity of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> full <S%H4390><s%> of perversion: <S%H4297><s%> for they say, <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> doesn't <S%H7200><s%> see.
As for me also, <S%H5869><s%> my eye shall not spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither will I have pity, <S%H2550><s%> but I will bring <S%H5414><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> on their head. <S%H7218><s%>

Behold, <S%H376><s%> the man clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who had the inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side, <S%H4975><s%> reported <S%H7725><s%> the matter, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> as you have commanded me. <S%H6680><s%>
